title: React E-commerce
description: An e-commerce app built with React and Material UI. Designed for a course project, it demonstrates core e-commerce functionalities.

title: Backend E-commerce
description: A backend for an e-commerce site using Node and MongoDB. Includes user auth, product APIs, and secure data handling for a full-stack app.

title: JS E-commerce
description: A basic e-commerce interface built with vanilla JavaScript. This project simulates key features like a dynamic cart and product catalog.
